title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7510.1 - Visits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7510.1 - Visits

State Regulations
(a) All prisoners
shall be permitted to converse with their counsel or religious advisor under
such reasonable regulations and restrictions as the officials in charge may
establish. (b) Visits to prisoners
by a family member, relative or other person may be permitted at the discretion
of, and in accordance with regulations established by, the officials in
charge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7510.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter IV
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
